summary: Removes the swirls from Stendarr's Aura spell.
descriptionHtml:
If this needs an update or change just PM me. I have not modded or played Skyrim for quite some time but am planning on some new stuff. All my old mods were made from requests and probably have incompatibilities and/or are obsolete at this point. I don't even have the original files but I downloaded backups.Â 

This was made in response to a request.

This mod removes the swirls from Stendarr's Aura spell. This only removes the annoying swirls, nothing else.

If anyone would like me to expand on this and change some other spells or anything, just PM me and I will get back to you.

Please endorse if you like this mod.

PM me for more requests, ideas, advice, complaints, etc.

Check out my other mods here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/7172874/?tb=mods&pUp=1
author: MinisterTanner
